arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest vs Sunderland: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 6, 2025
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou is seeking his first victory as Nottingham Forest manager in his first time in the dugout at the City Ground. Reinildo Mandava will serve a three-match ban for his rash reaction to kick Matty Cash against Aston Villa, so Arthur Masuaku looks poised to replace him at left-back and earn his full Premier League debut since arriving at Wearside.
